00016 #define DISCOUNT 0.90
00017 #define TD_DISCOUNT 0.9
00018 #define PSR_STEP_SIZE 0.25
00019 #define STEP_SIZE 0.001
00020 #define STEPS_PER_EPOCH 100
00021 #define MAX_STEPS 0
00022 #define MAX_TIME 0
00023 #define TEST_RUNS 1
00024 #define NN_LAYERS 2 // includes input dimension and output dimension
00025 #define PARAM_FILE "PSRTest.params"
00026 #define MAX_RAND_PARAM 0.00
00027 #define MAX_HISTORY 1000
00028 #define MAX_CORE_TESTS 10
00029 #define MIN_KAPPA_FOR_CORE 20.0
00030 #define PASSES_BEFORE_ADDCORES 5
00031 
00032 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00033 
00034         
00035     Vector nnDims(NN_LAYERS);
00036     nnDims[0] = MAX_CORE_TESTS;
00037     nnDims[1] = APPROX_OUTPUTS;
00038     Vector squash(NN_LAYERS); 
00039     squash.clear();
00040 
00041     int stepsPerEpoch = STEPS_PER_EPOCH;
00042 
00043     if (argc > 1) {
00044         stepsPerEpoch = atoi(argv[1]);
00045         //srandom(seed);
00046         //cout<<"Seed "<<seed<<endl;
00047     }
00048 
00049 
00050     // Create Cassandra with file from command line.
00051     Sequence* pomdp = new Sequence();
00052     
00053     // Test standard single agent case
00054     Controller* controller= new PSRTransform(new BasicController(new NeuralNet(nnDims, squash)), MAX_HISTORY, SYMBOLS, ACTIONS, PSR_STEP_SIZE, PASSES_BEFORE_ADDCORES, MIN_KAPPA_FOR_CORE);
00055     
00056     OLPomdp learner(controller, pomdp, DISCOUNT, STEP_SIZE);
00057     
00058 
00059     learner.saveBest(PARAM_FILE);
00060     learner.setUseAutoBaseline(true);
00061 
00062     time_t startTime = time(NULL);
00063     for (int i=0; i < TEST_RUNS; i++) {
00064         controller->randomizeParams(MAX_RAND_PARAM);            
00065         learner.learn(stepsPerEpoch, MAX_TIME, MAX_STEPS);
00066     }
00067     cout<<"Took "<<time(NULL) - startTime<<" secs\n";
00068 
00069     return 0;
00070 
00071 }
